content.body: Updated the calendar invite’s doc to that one

@softwarechris:matrix.org Can you give me moderator access to the invite’s meet? That way we can publicize the link and still have it be invite-only (people can just ask to join during the meeting if they’re not on the invite yet)
content.formatted_body: @Chris de Almeida Can you give me moderator access to the invite’s meet? That way we can publicize the link and still have it be invite-only (people can just ask to join during the meeting if they’re not on the invite yet)

content.body: you already have calendar permission and are the organizer of the meeting.  the web/video call settings are currently set to open access.  keep in mind if you change it from `Open` to `Trusted`, even if people are on the invite, they can only join automatically if their email on the invite is associated with a google account.  otherwise, they still need to be let in.  and the only person that can let anyone in is you
content.formatted_body: you already have calendar permission and are the organizer of the meeting. the web/video call settings are currently set to open access. keep in mind if you change it from Open to Trusted, even if people are on the invite, they can only join automatically if their email on the invite is associated with a google account. otherwise, they still need to be let in. and the only person that can let anyone in is you

content.body: I recall that being a problem, and the reason why the web meeting settings were changed to `Open`
